entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bachelors Island
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 8:32 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
